name: Downtown Partners Chicago
tagline: A dynamic collection of serial problem solvers.
description:
Downtown Partners is a full-service advertising and marketing agency backed by the Omnicom network.
It’s been a long time since there has been a great mid-size agency in the Midwest. We’re changing that. How? By changing the structure of the traditional ad agency. Downtown Partners is staffed with mainly senior level talent – less layers, less wasted time, more problem solving and action. Think of us as a creative SWAT team -- better listening, smarter questions. Our clients have ranged from Fortune 50 companies to start-ups, a city, an attorney general and more. And with every single client, we begin the same way: by listening and understanding their business. We’d love to hear more about yours.
